drive.label: Drive
drive.value: To turn the Wheel of Destiny towards his dominion over the dead.,To usher in a New Sun where he rules a world of the dead.,To exploit the prophecy of the changing of the worlds for his own ends.

abilities.label: Abilities
abilities.value:
• Death Touch: A single touch can sap vitality or kill.
  • Invulnerability: Nearly indestructible, save for his Collar of Eyes.
  • Magic: Blasts, illusions, telepathy, and teleportation.
  • Super-Senses: Via his Collar of Eyes, which is also his only weakness.

biography.label: Notes
biography.value: Lord Kisin is the Mayan God of the Dead and the Underworld, a hideous, mummified corpse dressed in ancient Mayan regalia. He seeks to exploit the prophecy of the changing of the worlds to bring about a New Sun where he rules over a world of the dead. His only weakness is his dependence on the Collar of Eyes for sight, a relic that grants him supernatural perception but also ties his power to its integrity. A being of immense malice and cunning, Kisin views all life as a fleeting distraction before the inevitable dominion of death.

system.description:
When Lord Kisin speaks, his voice carries the weight of countless dead souls, echoing with their whispers. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Afraid or Guilty on those who hear him, as the voices dredge up their deepest fears or regrets. If ignored, the whispers grow louder, drowning out all other sounds until the target is overwhelmed.

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{target:} All heroes within earshot

items.name: Collar of Eyes Gazes Upon You

system.description:
Lord Kisin's Collar of Eyes fixates on a hero, its many pupils dilating as it peers into their soul. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{tells them who they are or who they should be}, forcing a Label shift as he exposes their darkest insecurities. The gaze is relentless; if resisted, he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Insecure instead.

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{target:} One hero meeting his gaze

Lord Kisin raises his skeletal hands, and the air hums with the turning of the Wheel of Destiny. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.Rm4fQyfiwGkpytfF]{reveals the future}, showing visions of a world where his dominion is absolute—a lifeless wasteland where the heroes failed. If ignored, the vision becomes more vivid, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Hopeless as the inevitability of his victory sinks in.

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.Rm4fQyfiwGkpytfF]{target:} All nearby heroes

Lord Kisin reaches out with his Death Touch, his fingers brushing against a hero's skin. The contact is icy, sapping their vitality as he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.u8A6Gk7GoqBIMQBs]{captures someone} in a grip that feels like the grave itself. If resisted, he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Afraid, as the hero realizes how close they came to death.

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.u8A6Gk7GoqBIMQBs]{target:} One hero within reach

Lord Kisin summons the shadows of Xibalba, the Mayan underworld, to swirl around him. The darkness @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{endangers innocents} nearby, threatening to drag them into the abyss unless the heroes intervene. If ignored, the shadows claim their victims, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{inflicting collateral damage} as the underworld's grip tightens.

@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{target:} Nearby civilians or allies

Lord Kisin recoils, his Collar of Eyes darting nervously as he retreats into the shadows. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{gives ground}, teleporting away to regroup. Before he vanishes, he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.sSBCr0W3EJYs6Tg7]{announces between-panel threats}, vowing to return with greater forces from Xibalba.

items.name: Angry — Unleashes the Wrath of Xibalba

system.description: Lord Kisin's rage ignites, and he summons the full fury of Xibalba. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{inflicts collateral damage}, blasting the area with necrotic energy that withers everything it touches. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Afraid or Hopeless on those caught in the onslaught, his voice roaring like a thousand dead souls.

Lord Kisin's guilt manifests as a desperate need to justify his actions. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{tells the heroes who they should be}, accusing them of failing to prevent the suffering he causes. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{endangers innocents} , forcing the heroes to choose between saving lives or stopping him.

items.name: Hopeless — Drains the Will to Fight

system.description: Lord Kisin's despair radiates outward, sapping the hope from those around him. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Hopeless on nearby heroes, his voice a hollow whisper of inevitability. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.Rm4fQyfiwGkpytfF]{reveals the future}, showing glimpses of a world where resistance is futile.

Lord Kisin's insecurity turns to fury as he targets the hero who exposed his doubts. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.7bUuUXo8ob2I9rx3]{lashes out verbally}, mocking their failures before @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} of Insecure or Afraid. His Collar of Eyes flickers erratically, betraying his own instability.
@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.voNk2PNNF7oNqnSn]{Make a Playbook Move}

items.name: Activate Downsides of Abilities and Relationships

system.description: @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.NXgUwNBxnjOEIqRa]{Activate the Downsides of their Abilities and Relationships}
